description: Go wireless with Bluetooth streaming and get more out of your music, gaming, and video experience with the Philips Fidelio DS3510 Speaker. This compact, elegant, portable speaker charges and plays your iPod/iPhone/iPad and lets you connect and sync it to your computer via the included USB cable. Neodymium construction provides crystal-clear sound, Bluetooth ensures superb gaming sound effects, and shielding technology blocks cell phone interference. Flexible power options mean you can take this speaker on the go (portable) or keep it set up on a desk or nightstand to rock your space.
title: Philips Fidelio Docking Speaker iPod, iPhone and iPad, DS3510
